title: Building a New House? 12 Experts From the AD PRO Directory to Take On Your Next Home Project
description: These AD-approved builders and contractors can help you create a modern masterpiece
author: Elizabeth Stamp
excerpt: These AD-approved builders and contractors from across the US can help you create a modern masterpiece
text: An architect can design an exceptional home, but it takes talented builders and contractors to make that dream home a reality. If you're beginning the process of building a new house, it’s essential to find the right collaborators to ensure the process stays on time and on budget. Whether you’re looking for someone to work alongside your architect and designer or a design-build firm that can do it all, the builders and contractors on the AD PRO Directory have the experience to tackle everything from comfortable family homes to complex architectural showstoppers. Find the perfect partner in your area on our list of AD-approved builders and contractors.APPLY NOWGrow your business with the AD PRO DirectoryArrowEscobedo GroupThe Escobedo Group collaborated with architect Paul Lamb on an Austin home, including the fabrication of a custom staircase that features a curved single stringer, and integrates brass mesh framed with steel and white oak treads. Douglas FriedmanFounded by Dario Escobedo and now run by his son David, the Escobedo Group is a Texas-based design and construction firm that uses the latest technology to elevate its luxury projects. The company is a trusted partner of top talents, including AD100 Hall of Fame designer Kelly Wearstler, Specht Architects, and Hocker Design, and closely collaborates with architects, interior designers, and clients to streamline the construction process. The company also boasts a 60,000-square-foot production facility outside Austin, which allows it to fabricate all of a project's millwork, stone, and metal elements in-house.Kingdom & Co.Exposed brick adds warmth and character to the kitchen of a new build by Kingdom & Co. in Centennial Hills, Nevada. Stephen MorganDesign-build firm Kingdom & Co. is a go-to for homeowners in the Las Vegas area hoping to build their dream home or transform their current residence. The firm has shown its chops working with the HGTV show Property Brothers on eight projects and has a clear, carefully planned process that results in shorter construction timelines and fewer surprises during the build phase. In addition to new builds and renovations, Kingdom & Co. also constructs custom casitas and additions.NS BuildersSleek lines, natural tones, and abundant light create a calming atmosphere for ultimate relaxation in this serene spa retreat by Cambridge Seven Architects and NS Builders. Michael J Lee PhotographyFounded in 2014 by Nick Schiffer, NS Builders brings a talented and experienced team of project managers, carpenters, and specialists to its work in Boston and eastern Massachusetts. The firm places a strong emphasis on exceptional craftsmanship and sustainability, including eco-friendly materials and building techniques in each project. Focusing on high-end custom homes and substantial renovations, NS Builders is known for its light-filled, clean-lined aesthetic, and the firm’s sister company, Materia Millwork, specializes in modern custom cabinetry and millwork.DowbuiltDowbuilt collaborated with architecture firm Olson Kundig on a striking residence in Sun Valley Idaho. Benjamin BenschneiderDowbuilt has been crafting high-end residences across the United States for 45 years, gaining a client list that includes celebrated architects and designers such as AD100 firms Marmol Radziner, Olson Kundig, and Robert Stilin, and AD100 Hall of Fame honoree Axel Vervoordt. The general contractor has teams in nine regions, allowing it to take on projects everywhere from New England to Hawaii. While the firm works in a range of styles, its talent in concrete and steel is showcased in its contemporary builds.Z BuildersZ Builders constructed Atelier 216, a 4,400-square-foot, eco-luxury residence on a private acre bordering a 160-acre reserve in Amagansett, New York. This five-bedroom smart home features an eco-smart saline pool, pool house, and two-car carport, with every detail meticulously curated to blend design, luxury, technology, and nature in perfect harmony. Adrian GautClients of New York design-build firm Z Builders get a team with over a decade of construction experience combined with the design chops of Studio Zung. The result? Expertly designed and crafted residences, and a smooth, efficient process that helps eliminate miscommunications, delays, and other unwanted surprises. The firm’s contemporary pads in the Hamptons feature contemporary aesthetics, spacious layouts, and strong connections to the surrounding landscapes. Z Builders places an emphasis on sustainability and uses ethically sourced and long-lasting materials. If you’re building a new house with style and substance, look no further.CEID - Court Earp Interior DesignCourt Earp Interior Design optimized the flow of a minimalist home in North Boulder, maximizing the space and creating areas for entertaining. Ric StovallWorking in Portland, Oregon, and Boulder, Colorado, Court Earp Interior Design (CEID) is able to tackle every aspect of a project, from construction management to furniture selections. Founded in 2006 by builder and designer Court Earp, the firm has an extensive residential portfolio featuring homes of all types, from contemporary cottages to modern mountain homes—each beautiful balancing functionality, comfort, and the client's personal style. CEID is known for its custom cabinet and millwork design and collaborative approach to building.APPLY NOWThe AD PRO Directory is now accepting Builders and ContractorsArrowCorr Contemporary HomesCorr Contemporary Homes crafted a sleek, moody kitchen in a Los Angeles home. The kitchen is finished in stained white oak with a Miele appliance package and custom lighting by KGM. All appliances are recessed and hidden behind doors to preserve clean lines throughout. Mike KelleyCorr Contemporary Homes has made a name for itself by building residences in Los Angeles’s most sought-after neighborhoods, from Malibu to the Bird Streets. The firm is known for its ability to complete technically challenging builds with meticulous attention to detail. James Corr and his team excel at contemporary projects, elevating minimalist designs with quality craftsmanship and exquisite materials. Corr Contemporary Homes collaborates with some of the region's most well-known contemporary designers and architects, including McClean Design and Quinn Architects.J. Kramer CorpPerched on a golf course in Huntington Beach, the Courtyard House perfects seamless indoor and outdoor living. Once the site of a dated two-story home, it was reimagined and rebuilt as a modern single-story masterpiece by J. Kramer Corp and architect Mathew McGrane. Mellon StudioOrange County–based J. Kramer Corp crafts striking homes throughout Southern California, from oceanfront homes in Laguna Beach to mountain retreats in Mammoth. The firm specializes in modern design, bringing in their clients’ individual tastes and styles. The general contractor and builder boasts decades of experience with challenging projects and sites, including coastal areas and hillsides. J. Kramer Corp utilizes a trusted roster of subcontractors and carefully oversees each project, communicating with all parties and keeping construction on track.MV Group USAMV Group USA constructed a spectacular 9,000-square-foot waterfront estate integrating European elk wood and herringbone stone. MV Group USAMV Group USA translates Miami’s luxurious, artful atmosphere into high-end custom homes in some of the city’s most exclusive enclaves. The company, which was founded in 2007 by president and CEO Manny Angelo Varas, specializes in waterfront homes, and counts pro athletes, billionaires, and entertainers as clients. The team of builders and designers takes on a select number of projects and is responsible for residences that have set sales records for their neighborhoods.D EditorsD Editors collaborated with Randall Stofft Architects and Sarkela Corporation on a contemporary residence in the Royal Palm community of Boca Raton. Life Style Production GroupSleek contemporary Italian style is D Editors’ forte. The Boca Raton and Italy–based company creates bespoke luxury homes to discerning clients in South Florida. D Editors uses high-quality materials and custom makes furnishings, rugs, cabinetry, and even art for projects, bringing a unified aesthetic to each home. The modern dwellings are made for indoor-outdoor living and incorporate unique features such as eye-catching wine storage walls, artful lighting installations, and showstopping staircases.Koral Brothers IncKoral Brothers Inc collaborated with architecture firm Sawyer | Berson on this modern beachfront home in Southampton. John Musnicki PhotographySouthampton-based Koral Brothers Inc has been enhancing the Long Island landscape for over 100 years, and its century of experience shows in their finished residences. The team includes architects, craftsmen, project managers, and structural engineers, which allows the company to design and build projects faster and more efficiently. Koral Brothers works on projects of all styles and excels at modern and minimalist designs, including the firm’s collaborations with top architects such as Sawyer | Berson and Steven Holl.Cadre General ContractorsEnglewood, Colorado’s Cadre General Contractors prides itself on building architectural masterpieces and welcomes challenging and complex projects. The firm collaborates closely with the client’s architect and designer, keeping the project on track and solving any problems that arise. The builder’s finished homes balance style and functionality and are crafted to endure the tests of time. From a mountainside modern retreat to a contemporary take on a ranch home, the firm’s projects showcase innovation and craftsmanship.
html:
An architect can design an exceptional home, but it takes talented builders and contractors to make that dream home a reality. If you're beginning the process of building a new house, it’s essential to find the right collaborators to ensure the process stays on time and on budget. Whether you’re looking for someone to work alongside your architect and designer or a design-build firm that can do it all, the builders and contractors on the AD PRO Directory have the experience to tackle everything from comfortable family homes to complex architectural showstoppers. Find the perfect partner in your area on our list of AD-approved builders and contractors.

APPLY NOW

Grow your business with the AD PRO Directory

Escobedo Group

Founded by Dario Escobedo and now run by his son David, the Escobedo Group is a Texas-based design and construction firm that uses the latest technology to elevate its luxury projects. The company is a trusted partner of top talents, including AD100 Hall of Fame designer Kelly Wearstler, Specht Architects, and Hocker Design, and closely collaborates with architects, interior designers, and clients to streamline the construction process. The company also boasts a 60,000-square-foot production facility outside Austin, which allows it to fabricate all of a project's millwork, stone, and metal elements in-house.

Kingdom & Co.

Design-build firm Kingdom & Co. is a go-to for homeowners in the Las Vegas area hoping to build their dream home or transform their current residence. The firm has shown its chops working with the HGTV show Property Brothers on eight projects and has a clear, carefully planned process that results in shorter construction timelines and fewer surprises during the build phase. In addition to new builds and renovations, Kingdom & Co. also constructs custom casitas and additions.

NS Builders

Founded in 2014 by Nick Schiffer, NS Builders brings a talented and experienced team of project managers, carpenters, and specialists to its work in Boston and eastern Massachusetts. The firm places a strong emphasis on exceptional craftsmanship and sustainability, including eco-friendly materials and building techniques in each project. Focusing on high-end custom homes and substantial renovations, NS Builders is known for its light-filled, clean-lined aesthetic, and the firm’s sister company, Materia Millwork, specializes in modern custom cabinetry and millwork.

Dowbuilt

Dowbuilt has been crafting high-end residences across the United States for 45 years, gaining a client list that includes celebrated architects and designers such as AD100 firms Marmol Radziner, Olson Kundig, and Robert Stilin, and AD100 Hall of Fame honoree Axel Vervoordt. The general contractor has teams in nine regions, allowing it to take on projects everywhere from New England to Hawaii. While the firm works in a range of styles, its talent in concrete and steel is showcased in its contemporary builds.

Z Builders

Clients of New York design-build firm Z Builders get a team with over a decade of construction experience combined with the design chops of Studio Zung. The result? Expertly designed and crafted residences, and a smooth, efficient process that helps eliminate miscommunications, delays, and other unwanted surprises. The firm’s contemporary pads in the Hamptons feature contemporary aesthetics, spacious layouts, and strong connections to the surrounding landscapes. Z Builders places an emphasis on sustainability and uses ethically sourced and long-lasting materials. If you’re building a new house with style and substance, look no further.

CEID - Court Earp Interior Design

Working in Portland, Oregon, and Boulder, Colorado, Court Earp Interior Design (CEID) is able to tackle every aspect of a project, from construction management to furniture selections. Founded in 2006 by builder and designer Court Earp, the firm has an extensive residential portfolio featuring homes of all types, from contemporary cottages to modern mountain homes—each beautiful balancing functionality, comfort, and the client's personal style. CEID is known for its custom cabinet and millwork design and collaborative approach to building.

APPLY NOW

The AD PRO Directory is now accepting Builders and Contractors

Corr Contemporary Homes

Corr Contemporary Homes has made a name for itself by building residences in Los Angeles’s most sought-after neighborhoods, from Malibu to the Bird Streets. The firm is known for its ability to complete technically challenging builds with meticulous attention to detail. James Corr and his team excel at contemporary projects, elevating minimalist designs with quality craftsmanship and exquisite materials. Corr Contemporary Homes collaborates with some of the region's most well-known contemporary designers and architects, including McClean Design and Quinn Architects.

J. Kramer Corp

Orange County–based J. Kramer Corp crafts striking homes throughout Southern California, from oceanfront homes in Laguna Beach to mountain retreats in Mammoth. The firm specializes in modern design, bringing in their clients’ individual tastes and styles. The general contractor and builder boasts decades of experience with challenging projects and sites, including coastal areas and hillsides. J. Kramer Corp utilizes a trusted roster of subcontractors and carefully oversees each project, communicating with all parties and keeping construction on track.

MV Group USA

MV Group USA translates Miami’s luxurious, artful atmosphere into high-end custom homes in some of the city’s most exclusive enclaves. The company, which was founded in 2007 by president and CEO Manny Angelo Varas, specializes in waterfront homes, and counts pro athletes, billionaires, and entertainers as clients. The team of builders and designers takes on a select number of projects and is responsible for residences that have set sales records for their neighborhoods.

D Editors

Sleek contemporary Italian style is D Editors’ forte. The Boca Raton and Italy–based company creates bespoke luxury homes to discerning clients in South Florida. D Editors uses high-quality materials and custom makes furnishings, rugs, cabinetry, and even art for projects, bringing a unified aesthetic to each home. The modern dwellings are made for indoor-outdoor living and incorporate unique features such as eye-catching wine storage walls, artful lighting installations, and showstopping staircases.

Koral Brothers Inc

Southampton-based Koral Brothers Inc has been enhancing the Long Island landscape for over 100 years, and its century of experience shows in their finished residences. The team includes architects, craftsmen, project managers, and structural engineers, which allows the company to design and build projects faster and more efficiently. Koral Brothers works on projects of all styles and excels at modern and minimalist designs, including the firm’s collaborations with top architects such as Sawyer | Berson and Steven Holl.

Cadre General Contractors

Englewood, Colorado’s Cadre General Contractors prides itself on building architectural masterpieces and welcomes challenging and complex projects. The firm collaborates closely with the client’s architect and designer, keeping the project on track and solving any problems that arise. The builder’s finished homes balance style and functionality and are crafted to endure the tests of time. From a mountainside modern retreat to a contemporary take on a ranch home, the firm’s projects showcase innovation and craftsmanship.
